The CEO signed your access token using a weak public exponent. Can you recover the original message from the signature? The token is: 0x3d0ade9280c63536bee835cecae665d9bb6a875f2e3ce4857b334d760f2fda852e4567944912f64ff6b860afb4e76234c9fb0c618f39b48810ab0dc7904320c6

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{lewf4bpo}
ciphertext: 0x3d0ade9280c63536bee835cecae665d9bb6a875f2e3ce4857b334d760f2fda852e4567944912f64ff6b860afb4e76234c9fb0c618f39b48810ab0dc7904320c6
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (6335817476539133305918662975759955047417884924169024077766671593976128061119497902289551271859205575148565318018333491033001832338836872838647820152577929, 3)
